solution.text:
\(\frac {x}{_{j}_} + 1 = \frac {7}{_{{5*j}}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow \frac {x}{_{j}_} = \frac {7}{_{{5*j}}_} - 1\) (Shifting one term to R.H.S.)
\(\Rightarrow \frac {x}{_{j}_} = \frac {7 - (5 \times _{j}_)}{5 \times _{j}_}\) (Evaluating the numerator of R.H.S.)
\(\Rightarrow x = \frac {_{j}_ \times \frac {7 - (5 \times _{j}_)}{5 \times _{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) x = _{{trunc(Decimal(7-(5*j))/Decimal(5), 2)}}_
